data.description: install once, use anywhere for mappings
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
With different applications needing to access different encoding
    converters, it is helpful if it is possible to install a mapping, in
    whichever form it is: perl module, TECkit binary, etc. and for that
    to be accessible by a simple name from any application. This module
    implements such a registry using an XML based language. The module
    provides a library for using the registry and an application for
    editing the registry from the command line
